programme.title: Buying Judges and Acquiring a Patron Saint
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cook examines Irish heritage in America and the celebrations of St.Patrick's Day.
programme.medium_synopsis: Recalling a misleading first impression of America, Alistair Cook examines St. Patrick's Day celebrations and the influence of Irish immigrants on the Democratic Party.
